Ipswich Mobile Library Route 13

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 13 Town/village Location Time
MIP/13A Crowfield Lay by 0925 – 0945
MIP/13B Coddenham Haysel House 0955 – 1050
MIP/13C Barham Sorrel Horse 1100 – 1110
MIP/13D Creeting St Mary Whissels Farm 1120 – 1130
MIP/13E Creeting St Mary Village Hall 1135 – 1145
MIP/13F Creeting St Peter The Lane 1155 – 1210
MIP/13G Earl Stonham Village Hall 1220 – 1250
MIP/13H Little Stonham Church 1400 – 1410
MIP/13I Little Stonham Magpie Inn 1415 – 1425
MIP/13J Mickfield Church, Debenham Road 1430 – 1445
MIP/13K Stonham Aspal Wingfield Meadow 1455 – 1530
MIP/13L Pettaugh Old Bull 1535 – 1555
MIP/13M Henley Garage 1605 – 1630

Calling every 4 weeks on Fridays:

2016: January (no visit), 29 January, 26 February, March (no visit), 22 April, 20 May, 17 June, 15 July, 12 August, 9 September, 7 October, 4 November, 2 December, 30 December

2017: 27 January
